info.startActionText: Answer the questions and win the prize if you're lucky!
info.startHintText: Every correct answer gives you {accrualPoints} points. Press the button to start!
info.continueActionText:
Hello again!
You have not finished the quiz yet
info.intermediatePageText: You have {accuralPointsToAnswer} correct answers out of {intermediatePart}, you have {accrualPoints} points for every correct answer so your score is {currentProgress}. Every point gives you one vote in the lottery for the prize.
info.finalIntermediatePageText:
Your score is: {currentProgress}. You've got {currentProgress} votes to participate the lottery. The winnner will be announced on {awardDate}

Cross your fingers and good luck.
info.subscribeOfferActionText: Your score is: {currentProgress}. You've got {currentProgress} votes to participate the lottery. You can boost your chance to win answering more questions. Subsribe for IQ MASTER and open 10 more questions to get more points. Every correct answer gives {accrualPoints} points extra!
info.paymentSuccessActionText: Confirmed! Now you have {additionalPartCount} more questions in every quiz to boost your IQ and your chance to win!!!
info.masterFinalPage:
CONGRATULATIONS!!! You complete the QUIZ! Your score is {currentProgress} points. You've got {currentProgress} votes to participate the lottery.

Cross your fingers and good luck
